snippet: The charges are the culmination of a long-running investigation into the Cuomo administration’s attempts to lure jobs and businesses to upstate New York’s limping economy....
abstract: Federal corruption charges are brought against former aides to New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo along with senior state official and six others; charges against former aides Joseph Percoco and Todd R Howe and state official Alain Kaloyeros include bribery and extortion; outcome of lengthy federal investigation into Cuomo administration's efforts to lure jobs and businesses to upstate New York is blow to Cuomo's prized economic development programs.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER, WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and VIVIAN YEE

lead_paragraph: The charges are the culmination of a long-running investigation into the Cuomo administration’s attempts to lure jobs and businesses to upstate New York’s limping economy.

headline.main: Ex-Cuomo Aides Charged in Federal Corruption Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Former Cuomo Aides Took Bribes to Steer State Grants, U.S. Says
